korean: 한스 씨, 이번 휴가 때 뭐 할 거예요?
english: Hans, what are you going to do during this vacation?
Hmm, I’m not sure. I don’t have any special plans yet.
I’m going to Jeju Island with my friends.
Jeju Island? What kind of place is that?
It’s a famous island. It’s located in the south of Korea.
Yes, the scenery is very beautiful.
Especially the sea view is really beautiful.

korean: 아, 그래요? 저도 한번 가보고 싶어요.
english: Oh, really? I’d like to visit it sometime too.

korean: 그럼 이번 휴가 때 같이 갈까요?
english: Then shall we go together this vacation?
I’ll tell my friends about it.

korean: 좋아요. 그런데 제주도에서 뭐 할 거예요?
english: Sounds good! But what will we do on Jeju Island?
How much is a plane ticket?
Hmm, I’m not really sure about that.
Shall we look it up on the internet?
Yes, good idea. Let’s look it up together.
